siteMetadata.title: Adam's Brain
siteMetadata.description: I'm Adam, this is a network of my brain. You can find my thoughts, journals here, and you can see that they are interlinked to each other, like nodes on a net, which means that the path you take to explore my thoughts, is very likely that it's unique to you. Isn't it interesting?
